column2: if you go there in the morning there will be a line and parking is a pain
column3: but it is worth it. Plus
column4: the line moves quickly. The service
column6: and decor are all great. It's a great place to hang out
column7: but it's the food and coffee that really makes this place special. The options are slim
column8: but that's because what they do offer is so well crafted. I am so lucky that I live down the road from Common Bond because there is nothing common about it. Everything is exceptional.
